name: Bottom Line Playtest
description:
Hello! We're looking for playtesters for our game Bottom Line!

All you need is a controller for each player (Ideally an Xbox controller), and up to 4 friends to play our game!  

If you don't have an Xbox controller, please check x360ce, which will allow you to set up an emulator to mimic Xbox controls with another device.

Each version of this build will come with a README file. We ask that if you do plan to participate in our playtest, that you take the time to go through the tasks laid out in each build and report your feedback using the enclosed link to a google form. 

This week, we're looking to you the player to help us determine which of our two levels we'll be focusing on as we finish our game.

The link for our playtest form can be found here and it should be filled out by each player that tested the game. Thank you for taking the time to play our game!

There will be new tests every week, so please come back often.
